value:
When I sacrifice this flesh and return
to my body of old...this world will be
the domain of Demon King Fomortiis!

Is the Demon King controlling me?
Or has he simply clawed his way
into the dark corners of my mind?

The human heart is an abyss... Deep,
dark, and full of hidden pockets in
which jealousy can fester unabated...

I will grant all your dark wishes, Lyon.
To crush Ephraim...to claim Eirika...
Need I go on?

Ephraim, Eirika... Leave me! If you do
not, I... No! I can't let it happen...
Rejoice. Embrace the darkness...

My plans draw ever closer to bearing
fruit... Yes, it will not be long now...

The resurrection of the Demon King
is close at hand...

How disappointing... To think this
frail form cannot manage so simple
a task...

You would grant me...even
further power?

I am the Demon King... I know nothing
of human frailty. I am supreme...

I know not by what power you
managed to summon me here...but
whatever your aim, it is too late.$k$pThis frail flesh is Lyon's no longer.
That weakling's very soul has been
all but consumed.$k$pI see the remains of the foolish hope
in your eyes. Such a spark should be
easy enough to extinguish.$k$pBut perhaps a bit of fun first... This
contract of yours binds me to battle
your enemies, does it not?$k$pVery well... But when the end comes,
Askr and the rest of this wretched
world will cower before me! Gehaha!
でやっ
くらえ！
ぐあっ…
人の子が…！
Do you challenge me?
Gehehahahahaha!
The time has come...
Too brittle, too weak!
I wanted to be you, Ephraim...
Heh heh heh...
Lyon, o prince of misery... This body is lost to you. It is mine to compel...
Hmph! Keep your wretched hands off me, human, or you may well lose them.
I've had my fun pretending to be human, but the need for charades has passed.
Do you really not know me? How poorly educated you are!
I am the Demon King... I know nothing of human frailty. I am supreme.
I will now grant you all of your darkest wishes!
...Hmph. Looks like I was wrong to disregard the value of human emotions.
Tear them to shreds.
Hmph...
Keep up.
